content.detailedDescription: Well me and my best friend were fishing at the rock quarry ( late nite early a.M.) . it was time to go home  so we started up the side of the steep hill . i was talking about something when i hear "look dick" i look at my buddy his eyes fixed at a spot in the sky so i look up . "oh a hang glider" i said and i get a answer " at night  ass hole!"   call me im not good at typeing
content.summary: Hang glider

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were in the driveway of my parent's home, about to get into our cars from a night of dinner and visiting with them. just before she got into her car, i gave her a hug and held her, during which i noticed a light up in the sky out in the distance beyond her above the tree line. i should mention my parents live in the middle of the city, not in the country. just a typical suburban setting. i'd say... at first there was nothing unusual about this light. it reminded me of a plane, and for the first 1/2 second or so that was what i thought it was, as it was a regular, plain yellowish/whiteish light. however, in the other 1/2 half of that first second i noticed it was moving, in the direction of where i was located, but not as fast as a plane should have been going. my next thought was it could have been a satellite in orbit. following that thought was that could not be the case, it was much too bright for that and too close. as mentioned earlier, it was far enough away and high enough in the sky i thought it was a plane, and did think so for the next few seconds....

about 4 or 5 seconds into watching this "plane", the light dimmed. it was still visible, but by now it was much smaller in diameter then before, i'd say about 1/2-3/4 of the size it was. it was still yellow/white in color. but what was really incredible was what happened next! as i see it getting dimmer, there is a time, which i'd say was less than 1/2 a second again, where th dimming stops as well as the light itself quits moving. remember, this whole time it is moving in my direction very, very slowly. in the next.... 3/4 of a second i see in the area brighten up really quick and shoot up, creating a tail. it reminded me instantly of a shooting star, except it was out into space, the tail was angled up , not straight up but at an angle as thought to get into space. the head of this "shooting star" had what i thought was some blue in the light, while the tale had some hints of orange. 

mind you, this all happened very quickly. i would imagine from me first seeing it to the ending lasted no more than 15 seconds. my poor girlfriend, i was huging her and she was talking to me, bless her little heart when she noticed i had a look of "what on earth is that?!?" on my face, and realized i was not paying attention, turned around and saw the shooting star going up and out into space.





as mentioned, at first i thought it was a plane. after seeing it was going too slow i thought itwas something else. what i first thought of was the soap opera "guilding light", in which the lantern or light or what have you, is rotating. the light was also not a round light, not a perfect circle. in fact, it was somewhat box like, not quite 100% but had some.... hard to define edges. that was another reason i thought of that soap opera, it did for some reason bring up a light in a lantern for some reason in my mind.

as it shot up into the air, i couldn't believe what i was seeing! sure, planes might turn off their lights for whatever reason. objects can slow down in the air or maybe it was a helicopter or blimp, who knows. with whitman afb only 60 miles southeast of where this is located it wouldn't have surprised me much if it was one of those guys. we see the b-2's fly around here once in a blue moon so you never know what to expect. however... i have never heard or seen anything do what i saw last night. the little 8 or 9 year old thought it was pretty cool, but the grown up in me kept thinking "what the hell is that!"

please feel free to contact me regarding this event. it happened so fast i didn't get a chance to get a picture of it. however i did get the time right after, 10:40pm on the dot, and my compass app on my iphone had the approximate direction as west north west. i then texted myself a description of what happened within the first 5 minutes, and posted this on mufon's site as soon as i possibly could.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White/yellow light, moving slowly. stops for a few seconds, light dims, then streak of light with a tail going up into sky

content.detailedDescription: Using my digital camera, i photographed the post-sunset glow over boston harbor last night. didn't notice anything at the time but when i downloaded the images tonight, i noticed a full moon-like something just above the horizon across the harbor in one photo. the timestamp on the photo is 9:19:24 pm (it looks like my time on my camera is set 26 min. fast, so the real-time would have been about 8:53:24 p.M.). the thing does not appear in the next photo, which was taken 30 seconds later, or the previous photo, which was taken approximately 15 min. earlier.
content.summary: There is a full moon-like thing just above horizon in photo i took of sunset yesterday - will email it if u want 2 c it
content.locationName: Unknown cuz it was across, Massachusetts

content.detailedDescription:
I was out back trying to focus on the moon with my telescope my wife bought me for father's day when out of the corner of my eye i spotted a bright white star like orb almost like a fast float speed what was odd is that it was silent and had no beam like head lights or flashing lights like a plane. i turned on my phone to shoot the short clip but my storage only allowed what you see in it. so i ran to get my wife and by the time she came out it was gone. for this would be impossible at the speed it was moving it still should have been there. i will be forever haunted that i went to get my wife
---- chad in grove city ohio
content.summary: I saw white slow moving orb come out of tree line bigger and brighter than stars have a short video went in to get wife and it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
1. senior prom sitting on a bench looking over a huge country club golf course.

2. i was looking at the sky and i saw it and asked my girlfriend next to me why she thinks that the plane didnt have and blinking lights.

3. a plane with no lights then i realized what i saw wasnt a plane.

4. moving in a straight line and the it just faded out, out of nowhere.

5. excited ive always wanted to see a ufo. since i am very intrested in ufos i look alot to the sky.

6. it just disappeared, i watched it fade out quickly
content.summary: Glowing light moving faster then plane, just disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were traveling south on lakeshore drive when 2 unknown lights came zooming over us, stopped abruptly when it got over my car,following us at our speed of about 40 miles per hour. it was dark, and all i could see were the lights. i assumed it was a ufo, not that i believed in them at the time, but it was too strange and high -tech for humans even now! this was 1974. the ship, or whatever stopped because i stopped, thinking that i could get them to land. i liked "the day the earth stood still" and had thoughts of meeting an alien.I opened my car door so i could signal them but as soon as i did, a third light came on and it made a little air noise, like compressed air flowing for a split second and it shot off like a bullet. i guessed that it was a good 20 miles away in the first second of flight. we could see it go like a meteor southward and i could estimate that it was somewhere over the benton harbor airport area in one second. lost sight because it kept traveling at that speed as far as we could tell.
there was no other sound the whole time and i had my sunroof open that night.
i could see it overhead staying right with my car as we traveled.
after we stopped, people from the car behind me and in front of me came over and started talking to us about the ufo because they stopped when i stopped but were never that close to it. it appeared to be just above the treetops.
the next day i was listening to the radio and a lady from st. joseph was calling in to describe the same thing hanging over her house. she said it was there for about an hour. my friend said he could see a triangle shape from below the craft. we never reported it.
one of the weirdest parts is when the friend came to my house about 10 years later and denied ever seeing anything. then the next time i saw him ( another 10 years later ) the first thing he says is "hey, remember when we saw the ufo?"
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 lights came overhead too fast for any know propulsion, hovered over my car with it moving, stopped when i stopped and another light came on, a puff noise (no other) and took off at bullet speed

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our yard mulching and working on our pond at 6:30pm.  my wife called to me and pointed at the sky.  she pointed at the cloaked object in the sky. i saw what i can best describe as a very shinny metallic orb in the sky with what i can best describe as a semi oval horseshoe crab shape with two oval light in the tail area. during the few seconds of our sighting the object crossed through a cloud an this revealed its shape as it moved through the cloud. the cloud appeared to flow like water over the object.  we lost sight of the object when our view was blocked by a tree in our yard. when we walked around the tree it was gone. we both felt like we witnessed something that should not exist.
content.summary: Completely unconventional aircraft this thing was completely cloaked with the exception of two rear lights and a center orb. it distorted the sky around it. when it passed through a low cloud we saw the complete shape more readily. it was incredible.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a little later to get outside so i got a chance to see this object for a few minutes with the camera, i tried to take a picture of it but it would not show up on the camera for some reason. my father managed to get a video of it but he decided to keep it zoomed in the entire time so to me it looks a little blocky.

any who this looks like the same white object i saw on june 1st with my mother, brother and father but this time around it was me, my father and my mother.

this time the object went south east instead of north east and it was just as bright as the one i saw june 1st.
content.summary: Looks like same object i reported june 1st

content.detailedDescription: While looking for a house in cape coral, fl i noticed an object that i thought was a blimp in the street view. it bothered me and after a while i looked at it more closely and found that if i moved one frame in google earth the object was shown moving along the roadside power lines and traveled from horizon to horizon in 4 frames which covered not more than 200 feet in front of the house i was looking at. one frame was close enough to see circular spots clearly on the object that could be like holes or lights or something - to me it almost looked like a giant whiffle ball but not really. the detail is very good.
content.summary: On google earth - excellent visual of a 20' sphere going in opposite direction of google veichle at high speed following power lines daytime

content.detailedDescription: Panning the night sky  with night vision on 6-15-13 ----came across 2 objects together then split off in different directions
content.summary: 2 orbs travaling together then split in different directions

content.detailedDescription:
Ironically enough i was talking about ufos with a guy that works on the renovation of our house after dinner. no misunderstanding, i am a practical man not a deluded ufo type. 11 pm, clear sky, a few stars, bright moon 3/4.
i saw a light approaching. first thought it was airplane with landing lights even though our location is still far from any airport.
the light came drifting in our direction. it was way too bright for any craft. can't tell height. absolutely no blinking signal lights. just a very bright white orb. when it was closest to us we noticed two sets of small "light rays" like emmited on the edges of the light ball. one green, one red (see illustration).
the ligth went over a low light cloud and was still very visible through it. i said "this light is very bright". my friend said "indeed".
it past over us describing an arch changing smoothly its course.
we changed our location to follow the object by sight.
it went in the path of the very bright moon and was still clearly visible and very bright. speed was average. like floating. clearly not any type of chinese lantern though. too big and high.
we watched it go away southward. then in 3 seconds it "turned off" and vanished.
content.summary: A bright light approached us. first thought it was airplane with landing lights. then light was too bright for traditional airplane plus two sets of colored "light rays". described arc trajectory slowly. suddenly faded off. disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Let the dog outside.I seen a flash over the trees it looked just like a movie projector light.It was just a second.Thought i was seeing things.After a min or two a light appeard behind the tree same area i seen the flash,i watched it move slower than an airplane noiseless and it shuffled,weird.Feeling like you,i can see you feeling.No flashing lights went over my head southeast.Then faded out,disappered.Lasted 5min.
content.summary: Had a beam horizontall like a movie projecter

content.detailedDescription: This is a photo my daughter took. she hasnt called me or spoken to me but look at it...Closely dont you see like grids underneath the "rainbow" my daughter does not know i am writing you. yes it prob is a rainbow but man what a perfect disquise! this would be a first that i know of. if you are interested in more info. email me
content.summary: I just saw this on my daughter's facebook it is a pic she took

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling north on highway 54 east of mexico, missouri a well known road. just past a dog leg in the road perhaps 5 miles south of ladonia i noticed a blinking light above the horizon pulsing orange. i was a model control line flyer and well versed in aircraft and flight. i was puzzled that a radio tower had been placed in that position in just a week since i had traveled home the privious saturday as well. i was accompanied by my then fiance linda pflum. we were about 19 at the time. she was asleep on my lap and no we had not been drinking. 

i watched this bliking light as i drove north toward it and then it began to move. it would drop dramatically and speed up and as it did so the pulsation would increase and then slow as it slowed. i was very attentive and slowed down trying at this point to figure out what a helicopter was doing there this time of night but was more puzzled by the single orange light since the red/green nav lights were not present. there were open fields on both sides of me, farm land. to the left was a tree line perhaps a half mile or less away. the craft smoothed out its trajectory still moving slowly. there was no rural traffic at all that night. as the craft slowed to a hover over the tree line i woke linda. she was pretty fuzzy for a minute and asked what is that?

by this time i was stopped and she was becoming restless. at that moment two other rounded discs came up from behind the trees and hovered staggered just to the left and below it. first one and then the other started off in a path i judges would take them very close to mexico missouri to the southeast. linda told me she was afraid and we should go. i believe she started crying. the original object traveled across the field moving from my left in a eastern direction at maybe 10-15 mph. i backed my car a little down the culvert to try and get my headlights up but the object crossed in front of me one telephone pole length in front of me just over the telephone pole. i could have hit it with a rock. it gave me the impression that it looked like spun aluminum softly burnished and it seemed to glow orange from within.

it continued to travel across the field and started to move ne then accelerated rapidly and moved away. i could still make out the light so i took off as fast as the car would run. it was a 66 lemans with the high performance six and four barrel so i was running maybe 110-120. i cleared the town of vidalia at 110 and continued on. i slowed down as the road met highway 61 north and drove maybe 80 up past new london, missouri. there is a small river valley just outside of new london to the north, salt river i think. at the far eastern edge of the valley toward the missippi river there was an installation of three radio towers visable at that distance and there i saw the same craft or one like it doing circles around the top of the towers until the tree line obscurred my line of sight.

i observed that this was niether a helicopter,or fixed wing craft. it made absolutely no sound.  it was not a balloon as it accelerated and changed altitude as smooth as molasses. balloons don't outrun cars at that altitude with no wind. this was not something that we possesed the ability to make in 1966 if even now. it was perhaps fifty feet across.

i got two friends and we went back out to the towers after i dropped linda off. she was so frightened that she hid her eyes and refused to talk about it. i called the tower at quincy illinois the next day and asked if there had been anything on the screen other then routine traffic at around 3 am the night before. there was silence opon the line and the tower asked,"why, did you see something strange?" i told them that if i had i wasn't about to make a formal report and thanked him and hung up.

at the moment this happened i realized this was not something from here. i was overcome by a great since of awe and peace and excitement. i was energized after that and did not go to sleep till maybe 7 am.

i submit this now if for no other reason then to ad my observations to others and perhaps add a piece to the puzzle. i know what i saw and was very close to it and with my knowlege even then of aviation i understood this was something beyond our capability.Thanks for your work. thomas smith
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Traveling home.Saw object. it traveled south, met 2 others. it continued across a field in front of me 5 feet above power lines. traveled ne, accelerated. last seen around radio towers.

content.detailedDescription: This report comes from missouri north of kansas city approx 30 miles. i live in the country on a hill with no obstructions to the night sky and no street lights or buildings obscuring view. our back deck is a favorite place to be on beautiful evenings. there were 6 witnesses including myself. a very clear night . we had observed venus earlier to the west north....Just above tree tops of horizon. this came from similar direction. some one said to look could see venus again? was a very bright light moving west to east. so was not a planet or star. someone said space station. which i and others have seen before but? the orbit was wrong ...In my thinking though am certainly no expert. so the light was first observed west very similar to venus reckoning moved steadily in an east direction increasing in size due to proximity. in my observation was not within earth atmosphere. the light reflection or inherent was white and very bright. as moved from east to west went over us. not directly more like a 2 o'clock position. i thought object had shape to it  hourglass or a length rectangular? there was never blinking lights as an aircraft just steady bright white light that increased again due to proximity. object continued on west to east path . i say object because stars or aircraft don't do what we observed next. it seemed to be accelerating and gaining altitude ...Path was steady throughout observation. then ...The best way to describe was like a star trek ship going into warp factor....Went up ...Curving up and shot out of sight in a trail of red light then gone. i am 56 years young and this is first time i witnessed anything i felt could truly be categorized as a ufo. the other five witnesses concur and am sure glad they were there to verify what we all saw.
content.summary: Saw bright object moving w. to e. somewhat overhead at apex then accelerated vanishing in red light

content.detailedDescription: Phone call 3am from in-laws while we were asleep, husband runs outside to our back deck that faces the west and returns to wake me up. i ran outside with him so we could witness this together. it was a large air craft in the wnw sky of cleveland, tn from our back deck of our home (located off of dalton pike, se cleveland area). at first i thought i was dreaming and it was a hoax becuase i did not belive in such creatures or crafts (whatever they are). the craft was accurately darting left and right, then stopped momentaritly before moving straight up in air. it was almost as if it was searching for something or someone. then a single beam of light emerged as it was "scanning" the area or continuing a more in depth search. this occurred more than once with the beam "scanning" roughly about 4 times in 4 different directions. there was a small airplane (no where near the craft that flew over our home, it was loud and you knew it was a plane). the air craft in the distance was quite unusual and i have never witnessed anything like this in person. i have only seen such crafts in movies. this was a creepy feeling for not only myself, but our family as well. we never lost sight of the object, after about 15 minutes of observation, we decided 7am came early and we had to go back to bed so we could get up for work. to our knowledge, ti was still there after we went back in the house, i am not sure when or if it left the area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Witnessed large craft in distance darting, it moved up and down slowly after, bright lights and rotating in wnw sky

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure if this is any interest to you because this i would not consider a ufo just something unusual.

going to feed the cats on the back deck and opened the sliding glass door.  looked slighty,straight up, and straight behind me facing east.  first thought, at the time, was a funny looking cloud but no clouds at all in the sky.  second thought was a meteor falling to the sky but noticed it was frozen in the sky.  from where i stood the tail was approximately 2-3 inches long and the head about 1/4 inch in diameter.  appeared to have approximately 10 streaky tails at first.  slowly watched it evaporate starting from the tails and eventually the head, which took approximately 2-3 minutes. approximately 10 minutes later 2 military jets flew by but if it weren't for their trails would not have noticed them.  using the same approximate measurements, the jets were approximtely 2 mm.  the jets seemed to descended over the approximate area (from where i stood, but not sure on the distance from me)because their trails disappeared so know they began flying low.  unfortunately no pictures.  i wanted to keep watching to see what was in the head after the evaporatation.  but saw nothing.
content.summary: Appeared to be like a meteor falling from the sky and stopped dead.  was able to view everything from tail to the head.  took 2.5 min to totally evaporate, starting from tail.  approx. 10 min later 2 minitary jets flew by.

content.detailedDescription: A couple hours ago on june 19, 2013 i was standing on my front porch.  a solid white light was above the house when i looked up.  it was traveling west to east.  the light was not the headlight or landing light of a plane.  it was the same brightness and intensity above me as it was when it was flying away from me.  there were other commercial jets in the area with the normal landing lights and blinking collision lights and there was one helicopter in the distance.  i could hear the commercial jets and the helicopter; but there was no notice from this steady light traveling west to east.  after about 20 seconds, the light completely faded to nothing.  it was still close enough to me, i mean, it didn't fade away because of distance.  it just turned off.  no sound.
content.summary: Straight path white light west to east which disappeared before out of range

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the stars on a deserted country road near monroe, la. at approximately 10:45pm, i saw a high altitude aircraft fly over my position from west to east. a few minutes later, i saw what appeared to be a bright stationary star in the northwest sky. i did not notice the star there earlier. the "star" began to fade out until it was no longer visible. i thought this could be due to cloud cover obstructing the star, but i looked in that part of the sky with my binoculars and saw that the sky was clear. about this time, i saw two very bright flashes of light from the location of the "star". i did not see the object again after that.  i have been watching the skies for a long time and i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Ufo appeared to be a star. however, it slowly faded away until it wasn't visible. approx 30 seconds later it flashed very brightly two times and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 1020ish pm i was dumping out a drink at my sink dazing out the window.. there was a flash in the sky that lit  it up i went out my frount do to see if it was lightning but not a cloud in the skywhile looking up i noticed a bright light perfictly round i thought a helicopter but wy would it be up that high w its spot light on and no other flashing lights .. i fallowed it about 3 ft accross the sky and when it reached about a fingers length from an aairplane it appered to quickly raise in elevation untill it disappeared...
content.summary: Flash of light then dissappered

content.detailedDescription:
Another night of stargazing while listening to the bruins. sometime during second period of game 4 stanley cup, i noticed a heavy amount amount of air traffic in the sky. witnessed one plane actually tailing another. they were flying extremely close to one another, flew right overhead on me. didnt think much of it until i noticed both planes were out of view and then came back into view as they circled back from their flight path. they were flying ne and seemed to change path and head w-nw. i decided to keep my camera in my pocket at this point.
about ten mins later during the second intermission of the hockey game, i noticed an exceptionally bright object traveling across the sky coming from the nw heading to se. no strobes unlike ever other moving object in the sky that night. i first thought it might be a satellite but it seemed to large and bright. i began to film.
at :17 into clip you will see the roofline of the house dip into the picture as i also pick up on a stationary star viewable in my viewfinder. this was the brightest star my camera could pick up, but as you can tell the object was much brighter. 
you can witness an obvious change in the flight path as it moves away from the stationary star and seems to chase an airplane that is flying from s to n. plane is seen with normal strobing lights.
i stopped filming as both plane and object were about to disappear out of my pov over the roofline to my barn. i stated to walk around the barn to gain a better view and what i witnessed next, i will kick myself in the ass for not getting filmed. the bright white object shrank to barely viewable red dot within 1-2 seconds and then vanished. i tried to start filming the second clip but was not quick enough to catch this event. the end of this event seemed to mimic the end of the event i reported on 6/2/13.
a lesson to all, never stop filming!
content.summary: Bright white object, stationary flight path, changes path to follow airplane. what was not caught on film is up to you to believe

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on a bench in front of my house looking in the sky with a pair of binoculars towards the n/e sky at about a 70 degrees when i observed 3 white lights descending. as the objects continued downward, one broke away from the other two and ascended. the two continued downward and out of sight. the two remained the same distance until gone. the two looked to be connected to some dark solid shadow and appeared to be several miles long in connection. i was unable to photograph my observations because i could not see the light objects without the magnification of my binoculars.
content.summary: with boniculars saw 3 lights going down, 1 stopped went up. 2 continued downward.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on our deck talking at approximately 11:00 p.M. on a beautiful, clear night.  i was sitting at the table facing the neighbor's yard to the north, and my sister was at the table facing the south when all of a sudden, an extremely bright, fluorescent green l.E.D.-appearing "rope light" appeared on the neighbor's fence- out of nowhere!  it startled me- as there have never been any lights on the fence previously, and i was wondering why i hadn't noticed the "new rope lights" previously............My sister saw the expression of surprise on my face and said "what's wrong?" and turned to see what i was looking at.  as she turned to see the lights, they disappeared..........And reappeared at the top of a tree in the neighbor's yard!  when the fluorescent green l.E.D.-looking lights shone on the leaves at the top of the tree, they appeared to all "bunch together", and also appeared to emit what i can only describe as "gold, twinkling stars" -becoming very bright.  my sister said "wow!  what is that?" and i said "i have no idea!"  the fluorescent green lights then moved and shone as l.E.D.-looking lights on another neighbor's house.........And then, again, moved to the top of the tree in our yard.  my sister said "well, whoever you are, if you want to talk to us, come on down and do it!"  the fluorescent green, l.E.D.-looking rope lights began descending down the trunk of the tree, and i said "oh hell no!"..........And immediately they shot up into yet another tree in the neighbor's yard, "twinkling" at the top. this happened several times...........And as each incidence was clearly not the result of anyone with a laser-pointer (because they would have had to have been standing in the yard to have the lights shine on the trees and structures in the manner that they did, we were totally shocked and unable to explain it.  we then decided to walk around our block to see if we could see anything to help explain the situation.....But saw nothing.  my sister said she saw a "dark, shadowy, round object" in the tree just before the lights began "twinkling" on the leaves at the top, but i did not personally see that. my sister said it was the strangest thing she has ever seen, and i was freaked out.  after giving this much thought and discussion with my sister, we have pretty much come to the conclusion that the only explanation that makes any sense is that whatever it was giving off these lights had to have come from above, and/or in the trees!  very weird.
content.summary: Fluorescent green, l.E.D. appearing rope lights displayed on neighbor's backyard fence in a "snake" shape flashing sequentially

content.detailedDescription: I was walking one of my dogs close to midnight and as my dog stopped to do his business, i looked up at the sky as i usually do and saw a bright white light in the distance above the tree line. it was slightly bigger than the stars. thinking it was a plane, i glanced around and then back at the object and realized it had no blinking lights. i watched as it continued it's ascent between a couple stars and then slowly it seemed to fade and then it disappeared all together. there were quite a few airplanes flying around tonight but nothing that matches what i saw. could have been the military fooling around but i'm not entirely sure. it looked as if something was exiting our atmosphere! definitely not something you see every day, it has left me mystified and i only hope that someone else in my area happened to be looking up at the same time i was.
content.summary: A star-like bright light ascends then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
Good day,
 this sighting was on june 1, 2013 over miami, fl. our organization, the celestial federation of yahweh (cfy), was conducting our annual motorcade, the caravan of love 2, throughout the city of miami, fl. we were escorted by four officers on motorcycles from the sweet water police department. we stopped traffic for over 3 hours in the city.
 this photograph was taken by one of our members on her cell phone camera. anyone that has studied the topic of ufo's will be able to verify that these pictures are authentic. we were on interstate 95 when this photo was taken. enjoy. visit the [links moved to fi section/cms/tg]

sincerely,
[name removed/cms/tg]
[title removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: This sighting was on june 1, 2013 over miami, fl. our organization, the celestial federation of yahweh (cfy), was conducting our annual motorcade, the caravan of love 2, throughout the city of miami, fl.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch with my boyfriend smoking a cigarette. i was looking over my glasses and saw a light that looked too bright to be a star. i looked up and it was a bright yellowish-white orb that moved for less than a minute and vanished. about a minute or so after the first vanished the second appeared, and after i tried to point it out to my boyfriend it disappeared. when i stopped paying attention to it, it reappeared and once again vanished. i continued to look in the general direction and it blinked about 3 or 4 times before it went out completely. i couldn't believe what i was seeing, it looked like a star only brighter and moving. i tried to catch it on my phone but my phone died before i got the chance to. i kept my eye on both objects while visible until they just dimmed out until they seemed to vanish.
content.summary: Saw a bright orb for approx. 45 secs and vanished. second orb appeared and vanished multiple times and blinked, as if playing games with us.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to feed horse saw what looked like a strobing orange and yellow ball in west sky hovering.Seemed to be bouncing around a bit.Called my wife to look at it and we got the camera to get a picture,took 4 but can,t tell a lot from them.Came back in to get my long range camera and when i came back ouy it was gone.That afternoon at about 9:15 it was back in same place we watched it hover for about 15 min. or so then another showed up a few miles fron it at same height.They moved off one to the north the other west.Watched for them for a while when i saw one of them  straight overhead way up,there was a bright flash and it travled up and to the south and out of sight,i watched it  go almost straight -up and away.This was something that i can,t make sense of shook me up a bit!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw early in morning again at night,then saw overhead brite flash overhead then traveled up and away

content.detailedDescription: No object or creatures- just a bright orange beam of light came straight down.  so bright that it seemed like it was outside the window between me and & the next street.  could have been a meteor, but not like one i've seen before (not white or like a ball w/tail).
content.summary: Beam of bright orange light

content.detailedDescription: Visting everett wa june 15 2013. when leaving a relatives house, i noticed several small orange lights is the sky in a formation, some moved some did not. realizing i had to go back to my relatives house because a cell phone was forgotten, i turned around and headed back for the house. at the house, one one orange glowing fire ball was visible due to trees. when i got back to the place where i saw the formation, only one lager orange looking fire ball was in the sky that was stationary. there were no flashing air plane lights and it seemed to hover. i did not stay to witness any more since i had to be at another destination. once i made my way to i 5, i no longer saw the object. what i say was out of the ordinary and not a normal air craft that one see in the sky. could have been a orb as well.
content.summary: Orange fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke before bed , when i just happened to look up , when i first saw it i thought it was a satellite at first but it was moving from the south west heading in a north north east direction. while watching it i thought to myself that satellite is really bright and moving really fast and it was out of my site with in a minute .
content.summary: Solid white light no flashing very bright rapid speed with no sound heading north
